value.stringValue: The SKU for order {!$Record.OrderNumber__c} has been updated by ETL to : {!$Record.SPO_Sku_Code_S__c}.

decisions.name: Order_is_not_OK_for_JDE_2
decisions.label: Order is not OK for JDE

rules.name: Order_is_not_OK_for_JDE
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 AND 2) OR (3 AND 12) OR 4 OR ((5 AND 2) OR (6 AND 2) OR (7 AND 8 AND 9)) AND 10 AND 12) AND 11
rules.label: Order is not OK for JDE

rules.name: YesOrderisOKforJDE
rules.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 9) AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 8 OR 9) AND (5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8) AND (10 OR 9)) AND 11
rules.label: Yes

rightValue.stringValue: Production - Not complient with LV code
Client - Do not answer client need

formulas.name: OrderName
OrderNumber
UpdateOrder
formulas.expression: /* Use Amount field for Special Order to be as Perso or lv.com orders. List views or reports can use the same field */ {!$Record.SPO_TotalAmount__c}

formulas.name: Updateordertoexo
formulas.expression: AND ( NOT({!$Record.LastModifiedBy.BypassWF__c} ), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.SPO_Exo__c}, 'No' ), OR( AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} )) , 'EXO') ), AND ( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} ))), ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} ), CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} )) , 'EXO') ) ) )

formulas.name: Updateordertononexo
formulas.expression:
AND ( NOT({!$Record.LastModifiedBy.BypassWF__c} ), ISPICKVAL({!$Record.SPO_Exo__c}, 'Yes' ), OR ( AND ( ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial1__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial2__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_ExteriorMaterial3__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial1__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ), AND ( ISCHANGED({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} ), OR ( ISBLANK(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} )), NOT(CONTAINS(UPPER(TEXT({!$Record.SPO_LiningInteriorMaterial2__c} )) , 'EXO')) ) ) )
)
